conversion_verification.notes: The model successfully translates the 2D floor plan into a 3D isometric cutaway with clear verticality.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D projection and wall geometry. Minor perspective stretching on the left wing.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Layout fidelity is high; all rooms (Bedroom, Toilet, Utility, Kitchen, Living, Foyer, Balcony) are present and correctly sequenced. Wall proportions are well-maintained.

interior_elements.notes: High furniture fidelity; major pieces (sofas, dining table, kitchen stove/sink, toilet fixtures) are correctly placed and scaled.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering, good contrast between wall faces and floors. Background is clean and neutral.

detected_errors.description: The window in the bedroom is simplified compared to the multi-pane representation in the 2D plan.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D conversion that faithfully reproduces the layout, furniture placement, and proportions of the 2D architectural plan.
